original_text: All those who went to Egypt with Jacob—those who were his direct descendants, not counting his sons’ wives—numbered sixty-six persons.
korean_text: 야곱과 함께 애굽에 들어간 자는 야곱의 며느리들 외에 육십육 명이니 이는 다 야곱의 몸에서 태어난 자이며

sentences.original_text: All those who went to Egypt with Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱과 함께 이집트로 간 모든 사람들

sentences.original_text: those who were his direct descendants
